Text.Page:
Someone is aiding the devas, someone with a great deal of power. They need to be stopped. Infiltrate Deva Silva and kill {@LinkCreature:3#15#ebonheart sorcerers} and {@LinkCreature:3#14#reavers of resurrection}, and bring me their cold black hearts.

We'll teach them to ally themselves with enemies of the federation!
Thanks, <PCNAME>. Whatever nefarious plot they'd hatched, I'll sleep better know it's disrupted.
It's a grim mission, but we're fighting for the survival of Crescentia. It has to be done.
